EmailTemplate.description: When a training course is in Draft status for 6 months, the record owner (training admin) should receive an email alert letting them know they have a training record that has been in draft status for 6 months.
EmailTemplate.name: BLP Training In Draft For 6 Months
EmailTemplate.subject: Training In Draft For 6 Months
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!BLP_Course__c.OwnerFullName}, The Training Path '{!BLP_Course__c.BLP_Course_Name__c}' you drafted on {!BLP_Course__c.BLP_Draft_Status_Updated_On__c} is still in Draft status.
